name: Holler Peno Watermelon Salsa
author: MitchJGray
summary: If you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen! This recipe kicks and screams but works on so many different levels. Simple ingredients, powerful flavor profile. o garlic. Keeps the flavors of watermelon and jalapeno clean and crisp. Great with chips, or as a side with chicken, pork, beef, or seafood dishes.
ingredients: 2  jalapeno peppers, diced, or more to taste
kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine watermelon, cucumber, red onion, jalapeno peppers, cilantro, and mint in a large bowl
Squeeze lime juice on top; season with salt and pepper
Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving
